Function.Description: The loadWorkspace function loads the current Analytic Information Server Workspace from the specified filename.

Brief.Overview: The loadWorkspace function loads the current Analytic Information Server Workspace (including all non-empty global symbols previously saved) from the specified filename. The contents of the current Workspace can also be saved (see the saveWorkspace function).
Brief.Usage: Loading the Workspace restores the contents of RAM memory to a previously saved state.

Argument.Name: filename
Argument.Note: The name of the file from which to load the Workspace..

Argument.Name: fileID
Argument.Note: The fileID of the file in which to load the Workspace (see the fileOpen function).
